DOC.brief_summary: The current study design investigate influence choice exercise program exercise adherence . The two exercise program include 1 ) traditional exercise fitness centre 2 ) lifestyle exercise-walking use pedometer track step . Biological psychological indicator examine investigate effect choice sample sedentary adult .
